existing_features.title: Add a frontend admin-only UI control to trigger the backend reset with a clear destructive confirmation flow, and refresh the UI state after completion.

new_feature_requests.summary: Reset/Rebuild Version 53 from scratch as a fresh draft
Implement an admin-only backend method to reset the application to a fresh-draft state by clearing all persisted domain data (agents, properties, inquiries, and user profiles).

projectName: Add admin-only app data reset to rebuild Version 53 as a fresh draft
